reviews.review_msg: Very easy professor, cares about the material he teaches, ensures his students understand material, and goes out of his way to explain content in-dept for students who ask for help.

the best TA i've ever had. definitely try to get him for bpk 142 if you can. the material/course would not have been as enjoyable without him. makes the subjects easy to learn and is very knowledgable.

Super glad I had Brent as my TA for my first semester at SFU! He explains information clearly and makes sure we are understanding the material as he goes along. He also gives lots of tips which helped me through the entire term!

It was my first semester here at SFU and Brent was the best TA I've had. He replied to emails immediately, he was knowledgeable about the topic, and most importantly he was super caring. I got a C in this class, which was totally my fault, and plus it was my first year so I was still getting used to the environment.
Brent is hands down the best TA Ive ever met. He replied to emails really quickly and he just made the class more enjoyable
God of a TA
BEST TA EVER. Engaging and funny, might go on tangents however, is caring and wants to help you succeed.
Good online labs

Best TA at SFU hands down! Brent has an amazing knowledge of the course material and can help you with any questions you have. He replies to emails within hours and his review sessions are fantastic. Grading is super fair and so were his labs. Easy A if you put in the time and effort.

Such an amazing TA. This guy knows his stuff and is more than willing to help his students learn. He is extremely accessible, genuinely, caring kind, funny and helpful. By far the best TA I have ever had.
Greatest TA at SFU ! Take him if you can, you will find yourself a new favorite TA in university
Absolutely amazing! Have no other words to say!

The fact that all he's one of the highest rated profs at sfu without actually being a prof says a lot about his teaching abilities. Learned a lot from him and I never felt intimidated approaching him or anything. Literally the Greatest TA at SFU

If you get Brent as a ta, consider yourself blessed. I'm waiting for different semesters when he is a TA for some courses I want to take, just so I can try and take it with him. He's simply amazing. No other words to say.

A perfect world would be if I had Brent teach all my courses. He is better than ANY profs that I have had at my career at SFU. Someone make this guy a prof considering he's better than any professors around despite being a TA.
Best TA a first-year could hope for. Fun, relaxed, educational, fair, engaging, and still professional. He made the labs interesting and active to the point that I'd look forward to them. Legend.
Just a great TA all around and an even better guy. He's very engaging and is always willing to take the extra time to make sure you understand what's going on in class. Absolute legend!
great guy, passionate and engaging, lectures were a lot of fun

Brent was the greatest TA ever. I'm going to miss having a lab with him. And I typically don't like labs but he makes labs fun. Also, he opened up office hours up until 15 minutes before the exam, so it was nice to have the opportunity to go ask all the last minute questions I had. Overall, Amazing. Why is he not a Professor yet?

All these amazing ratings here aren't exaggerations. I love this guy. He's got so much knowledge and you can tell that he's passionate about what he's doing. And he has such a distinctive personality that it shines through even when he's sending out emails. Best TA I've ever had.

Best TA ever. Was very accessible outside of class, even changed his office hours once he realized nobody in his lab could make them. He was extremely kind and gave very good constructive criticism on lab procedures, and his examples of concepts were very clear. Very awesom and would 100% take a class with him again.

Brent is one of the greatest TA's there is. I would change my entire schedule around if it meant having him as a TA for one of my course. He is super knowledgeable (any question I had regarding the course, he answered it along with other supplemental information that I found very useful). He's better than all my profs right now. he should be a prof

The endless perfect reviews on here aren't a lie. Brent is one the best TA's SFU has to offer and is the best TA I have ever had. Not only is he approachable, personable and makes everyone feel comfortable, but he is also extremely knowledgeable and great at explaining things. He never didn't have a great answer to a question. Should be a prof!
The GOAT

Best TA ever. Engages students and explains topics in a way that is easy to understand but doesn't talk down to you. Super enthusiastic and always ready to help. Would rearrange schedule to have him be the TA if is was at all possible.
super duper approachable and knowledgeable. He'll never look down on you no matter what questions you ask him. Super helpful and is very good at explaining things in an easy to relate way
Brent is the best! He is so helpful, approachable and VERY knowledgeable!!!!

He's an expert in his field, and he provided supplementary info not found in the lab manuals - this, along with the fact that he would make everyone feel safe and included, has made Brent the best TA I've had so far. He'd make an exceptional prof, and isn't arrogant at all - you feel more like you're talking to a good friend who sees you likewise.
Good
So glad I took this course. Brent is a kind heart, and easy on the eyes. Very thorough and never condescending.

One of the COOLEST and MOST RAD TA's ever. Any questions you have he is always open to answer and really knows his stuff. It's easy to tell he's passionate about what he teaches and definitely made the anatomy and labs super enjoyable to learn! If you get him as your BPK 142 TA you'll have no problem!
Best TA I've ever had.
THE. BEST. He is able to answer your questions straightforwardly, unlike most TAs, and he is so informative. Always there if you needed help
really cool and approachable though looked way too young to be a prof. ran with us in the labs and was very encouraging!
The best TA I've had. If you're taking KIN142 he'll make it interesting and easy.
super helpful, really knows what he's talking about!
So GREAT! So HELPFUL! Always provided lots of feedback. Very easy to approach!
One of the best TA's ever!

Excellent teaching skills. I had him for kin 142 and he was very engaging, energetic and informative. There were many occasions where I was surprised by the amount of extra feedback he offered on charts/lab reports etc. Overall it was an awesome experience
BEST.
Oh my gosh..he is so awesome. Beyond words!
Mr. Awsome
TA for kin142..really funny and helpful!
